00038 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 bool FloorDialog::Initialize() {
00040         CvSize sz = cvSize(w, h);
00041         floorImg = cvCreateImage(sz, IPL_DEPTH_8U, 3);  
00042         floormap = cvCreateImage(sz, IPL_DEPTH_8U, 3);  
00043         motionmap = cvCreateImage(sz, IPL_DEPTH_32F, 1);        
00044         motionmapscaled = cvCreateImage(sz, IPL_DEPTH_8U, 3);
00045         motionmaptemp = cvCreateImage(sz, IPL_DEPTH_8U, 1);     
00046         fbuffer = cvCreateImage(sz, IPL_DEPTH_8U, 1);
00047         cvSet(motionmap, cvScalar(0));
00048         cvSet(floorImg, cvScalar(255, 255, 255));
00049         cvZero(fbuffer);
00050 
00051         if (!m_image.Initialize(doc))
00052                 return false;
00053         
00054         // check if there are enough extreme points
00055         if (m_extreme.GetCount() < 2)
00056                 return false;
00057 
00058         if (m_sourcename != "" && File::Exists(gcnew String(m_sourcename))) 
00059                 floormap = cvLoadImage(m_sourcename);
00060 
00061         GetMinMaxXY(floormin, floormax);
00062         return true;
00063 }
00064 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00065 void FloorDialog::DeInitialize() {
00066         cvReleaseImage(&floormap);
00067         cvReleaseImage(&floorImg);
00068         cvReleaseImage(&motionmap);
00069         cvReleaseImage(&motionmapscaled);
00070         cvReleaseImage(&motionmaptemp);
00071         cvReleaseImage(&fbuffer);
00072         m_extreme.RemoveAll();
00073         m_type = 0;
00074         m_sourcename = "";
00075         w = 800;
00076         h = 600;
00077 }
00078 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079 BOOL FloorDialog::OnSetActive() {
00080         CPropertyPage::OnSetActive();
00081         return m_image.Initialize(doc);
00082 }
00083 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 void FloorDialog::DoDataExchange(CDataExchange* pDX)
00085 {
00086         DDX_Control(pDX, IDC_FLOORIMAGE, m_image);
00087         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_FLOORNAME, m_sourcename);
00088         DDX_Radio(pDX, IDC_RADIOFLOORIMAGE, m_type);
00089         DDX_Control(pDX, IDC_FLOOR_SCROLLBAR1, m_vbar);
00090         DDX_Control(pDX, IDC_FLOOR_SCROLLBAR2, m_hbar);
00091         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_FLOORW, w);
00092         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_FLOORH, h);
00093 
00094         DDV_MinMaxInt(pDX, w, 1, 10000);
00095         DDV_MinMaxInt(pDX, h, 1, 10000);
00096         
00097         GetMinMaxXY(floormin, floormax);
00098 }

00102         m_extreme.RemoveAll();
00103         Invalidate();
00104         UpdateWindow();

00106 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00107 void FloorDialog::OnBnClickedFloorModelSelectButton()
00108 {
00109         UpdateData();
00110         if (m_type == 0) {
00111                 CFileDialog dlg(TRUE, NULL, NULL, OFN_FILEMUSTEXIST | OFN_PATHMUSTEXIST | OFN_HIDEREADONLY, "BMP files (*.bmp)|*.bmp|JPEG files (*.jpg; *.jpeg)|*.jpeg; *.jpg|All Files (*.*)|*.*||", this);
00112                 char title[]= {"Open Floor Plan Image File"};
00113                 dlg.m_ofn.lpstrTitle = title;
00114                 if (dlg.DoModal() == IDOK) {
00115                         m_sourcename = dlg.GetPathName();
00116                         floormap = cvLoadImage(m_sourcename);
00117                 }
00118         }
00119         else {
00120         }
00121         if (!Initialize())
00122                 m_sourcename = "";
00123         UpdateData(false);
00124         if (::IsWindow(theApp.m_pMainWnd->m_hWnd))
00125                 theApp.m_pMainWnd->PostMessage(WM_UPDATEACTIVEVIEW);
00126 }

00132 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00133 void FloorDialog::OnVScroll(UINT nSBCode, UINT nPos, CScrollBar* pScrollBar) 
00134 {
00135         int curpos = pScrollBar->GetScrollPos();
00136         int minpos;
00137         int maxpos;
00138         pScrollBar->GetScrollRange(&minpos, &maxpos);
00139         SCROLLINFO   info;
00140     pScrollBar->GetScrollInfo(&info, SIF_ALL);
00141         switch (nSBCode)
00142     {
00143                 case SB_TOP:      
00144                         curpos = minpos;
00145                         break;
00146                 case SB_BOTTOM:     
00147                         curpos = maxpos;
00148                         break;
00149                 case SB_ENDSCROLL: 
00150                         break;
00151                 case SB_LINEUP:      
00152                         if (curpos > minpos)
00153                                 curpos--;
00154                         break;
00155                 case SB_LINEDOWN:   
00156                         if (curpos < maxpos)
00157                                 curpos++;
00158                         break;
00159                 case SB_PAGEUP:    
00160                         curpos = max(minpos, curpos - (int) info.nPage);
00161                         break;
00162                 case SB_PAGEDOWN:
00163                         curpos = min(maxpos, curpos + (int) info.nPage);
00164                         break;
00165                 case SB_THUMBPOSITION: 
00166                         curpos = nPos;     
00167                         break;
00168                 case SB_THUMBTRACK:
00169                         curpos = nPos;     
00170                         break;
00171     }    
00172         pScrollBar->SetScrollPos(curpos);
00173         m_image.Invalidate();
00174     CDialog::OnVScroll(nSBCode, nPos, pScrollBar);
00175 }
00176 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00177 void FloorDialog::OnHScroll(UINT nSBCode, UINT nPos, CScrollBar* pScrollBar) 
00178 {
00179         int curpos = pScrollBar->GetScrollPos();
00180         int minpos;
00181         int maxpos;
00182         pScrollBar->GetScrollRange(&minpos, &maxpos);
00183         SCROLLINFO   info;
00184     pScrollBar->GetScrollInfo(&info, SIF_ALL);
00185         switch (nSBCode)
00186     {
00187                 case SB_LEFT:      
00188                         curpos = minpos;
00189                         break;
00190                 case SB_RIGHT:     
00191                         curpos = maxpos;
00192                         break;
00193                 case SB_ENDSCROLL: 
00194                         break;
00195                 case SB_LINELEFT:      
00196                         if (curpos > minpos)
00197                                 curpos--;
00198                         break;
00199                 case SB_LINERIGHT:   
00200                         if (curpos < maxpos)
00201                                 curpos++;
00202                         break;
00203                 case SB_PAGELEFT:    
00204                         curpos = max(minpos, curpos - (int) info.nPage);
00205                         break;
00206                 case SB_PAGERIGHT:
00207                         curpos = min(maxpos, curpos + (int) info.nPage);
00208                         break;
00209                 case SB_THUMBPOSITION: 
00210                         curpos = nPos;     
00211                         break;
00212                 case SB_THUMBTRACK:
00213                         curpos = nPos;     
00214                         break;
00215     }    
00216         pScrollBar->SetScrollPos(curpos);
00217         m_image.Invalidate();
00218         CDialog::OnHScroll(nSBCode, nPos, pScrollBar);
00219 }

00224 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00225 bool CFloorControl::Initialize(CNewVisionDoc* doc) {
00226         // Get first frame from file or camera
00227         image.CopyOf(imgFrame);
00228         // Show scroll bars
00229         if (m_hWnd) {
00230                 FloorDialog* tab = (FloorDialog*)GetParent();
00231                 CRect r; this->GetWindowRect(&r);
00232                 SCROLLINFO horz;
00233                 horz.cbSize = sizeof(SCROLLINFO);
00234                 horz.fMask = SIF_ALL;
00235                 horz.nPage = 50;
00236                 horz.nMin = 0;
00237                 horz.nMax = image.Width()-r.Width()+horz.nPage;
00238                 horz.nPos = 0;
00239                 horz.nTrackPos = 0;
00240                 tab->m_hbar.SetScrollInfo(&horz);
00241                 SCROLLINFO vert;
00242                 vert.cbSize = sizeof(SCROLLINFO);
00243                 vert.fMask = SIF_ALL;
00244                 vert.nPage = 50;
00245                 vert.nMin = 0;
00246                 vert.nMax = image.Height()-r.Height()+vert.nPage;
00247                 vert.nPos = 0;
00248                 vert.nTrackPos = 0;
00249                 tab->m_vbar.SetScrollInfo(&vert);
00250                 tab->m_vbar.ShowWindow(true);  //Hide Vertical Scroll Bar
00251                 tab->m_hbar.ShowWindow(true);  //Hide Horizontal Scroll Bar
00252                 this->Invalidate();
00253         }
00254         return true;
00255 }
00256 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00257 void CFloorControl::OnLButtonDown(UINT nFlags, CPoint point)
00258 {
00259         CWnd::OnLButtonDown(nFlags, point);
00260         FloorDialog* tab = (FloorDialog*)GetParent();
00261         CPoint off = CPoint(tab->m_hbar.GetScrollPos(), tab->m_vbar.GetScrollPos());
00262         int match = PointInDot(point+off);
00263         if (match != -1) {
00264                 m_current = match;
00265         }
00266         else {
00267                 tab->m_extreme.Add(cvPoint(point.x+off.x, point.y+off.y));
00268                 m_current = tab->m_extreme.GetCount()-1;
00269         }
00270         Invalidate();
00271         UpdateWindow();
00272 }
00273 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00274 void CFloorControl::OnMouseMove(UINT nFlags, CPoint point)
00275 {
00276         CWnd::OnMouseMove(nFlags, point);
00277         if (m_current != -1 && (nFlags & MK_LBUTTON)) {
00278                 FloorDialog* tab = (FloorDialog*)GetParent();
00279                 CPoint off = CPoint(tab->m_hbar.GetScrollPos(), tab->m_vbar.GetScrollPos());
00280                 tab->m_extreme[m_current].x = point.x+off.x;
00281                 tab->m_extreme[m_current].y = point.y+off.y;
00282                 Invalidate();
00283                 UpdateWindow(); 
00284         }
00285 }
00286 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00287 void CFloorControl::OnLButtonUp(UINT nFlags, CPoint point)
00288 {
00289         CWnd::OnLButtonUp(nFlags, point);
00290         m_current = -1;
00291         Invalidate();
00292         UpdateWindow();
00293 }
00294 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00295 void CFloorControl::OnKeyDown(UINT nChar, UINT nRepCnt, UINT nFlags) {
00296         CWnd::OnKeyDown(nChar, nRepCnt, nFlags);
00297         if (nChar == VK_DELETE && m_current != -1) {
00298                 FloorDialog* tab = (FloorDialog*)GetParent();
00299                 tab->m_extreme.RemoveAt(m_current);
00300                 m_current = -1;
00301                 Invalidate();
00302                 UpdateWindow();
00303         }
00304 }
00305 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00306 int CFloorControl::PointInDot(CPoint point) {
00307         FloorDialog* tab = (FloorDialog*)GetParent();
00308         for (int i=0;i<tab->m_extreme.GetCount();i++) {
00309                 if(d(cvPoint(point), tab->m_extreme[i]) <= DOT) {
00310             Invalidate();
00311                         UpdateWindow();
00312                         return i; // return the index of the match found
00313                 }
00314         }
00315         return -1; // no match found
00316 }
00317 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00318 void CFloorControl::DrawItem(LPDRAWITEMSTRUCT lpDrawItemStruct) {
00319         CDC* pDC = CDC::FromHandle(lpDrawItemStruct->hDC);
00320         FloorDialog* tab = (FloorDialog*)GetParent();
00321         int ox = tab->m_hbar.GetScrollPos(); 
00322         int oy = tab->m_vbar.GetScrollPos();
00323         image.Show(pDC->m_hDC, 0, 0, image.Width(), image.Height(), ox, oy);
00324         CBrush bNew(RGB(255, 255, 0));
00325         CBrush* pOldBrush = pDC->SelectObject(&bNew);
00326         for (int i=0;i<tab->m_extreme.GetSize();i++) {
00327                 CvPoint d = tab->m_extreme[i];
00328                 pDC->Ellipse(d.x-DOT - ox, d.y-DOT - oy, d.x+DOT - ox, d.y+DOT - oy);
00329         }
00330         pDC->SelectObject(pOldBrush);
00331 }
